Class TexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • loading.TexManager

  • public class TexManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages loaded textures TODO add method to remove animated textures and unload them
    Author:
    jafi2

      • loadTex

        public static void loadTex(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String location)
        Loads a texture
        Warning: does not do anything if texture name is already in use
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the texture
        location - the location of the texture

      • loadAnimation

        public static void loadAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String location,
                                 int fps)
        Load a new Animation
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the animation
        location - the folder containing the animation.
        The textures must have the following file structure: [location]\[number of image].png
        fps - the number of frames per second the animation has

      • getAnimation
